COPYRIGHTS:

Copyright 2016 AnnamAgroTech. All Rights Reserved.


This software may not, in whole or in any part, be copied, reproduced, transmitted, translated (into any language, natural or computer), stored in a retrieval system, reduced to any electronic medium or machine readable format, or by any other form or means without prior consent, in writing, from AnnamAgroTech.


You are granted a limited license to use this software. The software may be used or copied only in accordance with the terms of that license, which is described in the following paragraphs.


1. Farmers should register in Annam Agrotech Pvt. Ltd, either directly through Annam App or through call centre. 

2. Farmer should share his personal details while registering. (details like personal mobile number, email id, permanent address and about land of farming) 

3. No fare will be collected by Annam Agrotech for using Annam App or call center services, till we pass information about the service fare. 

4. Rental calculation will be done in advance and there may be change in the rent in accordance with duration and usage of machineries. 

5. Farmer should pay the rent directly to the driver/ machine owner. 

6. Annam Agrotech will not entertain any type of disputes in the terms rate, usage and timing.


TRADEMARKS: 

[Software logos, icons, etc that are Trademarked]
